org.spongepowered.api.entity.hanging

Interface ItemFrame

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataHolder, Entity, EntityState, Hanging, Identifiable

    public interface ItemFrame
extends Hanging
    Represents an ItemFrame.

    • Method Detail

      • getItem

        com.google.common.base.Optional<ItemStack> getItem()
        Gets the currently displayed Item.
        Returns:
        The currently displayed item, if available

      • setItem

        void setItem(@Nullable
             ItemStack item)
        Sets the item to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be displayed

      • getItemRotation

        Rotation getItemRotation()
        Gets the current Rotation of the ItemStack

        If the itemframe does not have an ItemStack inside, the rotation value will be used once an item is placed inside it.

        Returns:
        The current item rotation

      • setRotation

        void setRotation(Rotation itemRotation)
        Sets the Rotation of the item hanging in this item frame.

        If the itemframe does not have an ItemStack inside, then the rotation setting may be ignored.

        Parameters:
        itemRotation - The rotation
